title: is Bot lane Yasuo Legit?
body:
https://gyazo.com/6231a768ebd1652ffc9d1304c4a1adad

so i had this game during my diamond promo
Our ADC locked in Yasuo, and then our top laner took Heimer to compensate the lack of sieging

During the laning phase he fed hard with sion (obviously since you can't lane against marksmen) but afterward he forced 2 people to come bot (most of the time ezreal+karma) while we were pushing mid like hell with heimer+sion and vlad forced Darius to stay top

Is this strat good? split pushing with a melee and force the enemy adc to go bot

replies.body:
I would say that this should only be done by someone who is mechanically exceptional with Yasuo. 

As you mentioned, he is at an obvious disadvantage against marksmen, but he is quite capable of playing against marksmen as well. 

His itemization is actually quite similar to that of an ADC. 

Braum makes a very good support for Yasuo ADC. His CC allows them to punish enemies who get caught by it quite harshly. His Unbreakable ability is basically a mobile Windwall. His E allows him to jump to Yasuo with his own mobility and provides him some good resistances. And Braum's ultimate is PERFECT for initializing Yasuo's ultimate.
tHanks actually, next time i see adc yasuo i'll pick braum

Imaqtpie climbed from diamond to challenger exclusively playing yasuo adc only... then a few months later GP.

Even though he's a good player, it also lets you know the potential is there if someone put in enough practice.
imaqtipie played yasuo? lol ok didn't know this
It is what he was designed for, and it has been many times the highest winrate role for him.

New Ali probably isn't bad either, as Yoshi suggested. Great peel, more available knock up from Q, and I believe W still counts as a knock up, stun off of his new E, heals from his passive. 

The biggest reason why I would still say that Braum is better is because he works better WITH Yasuo on engage and disengage, and it is harder to actually mess up. I have seen too many Alistar's fail their Headbutt + Pulverize combos and ruin an engage completely, or actually give the enemy a free escape. 

Braum just pegs someone with his Q and says, "Go get that one! I'll be right behind you." 

And again, the ultimate synergy is orgasmic.
